Mulong Luo was born in Wuhan, China. He got his B.S. degree (honored) in Microeletronics at Peking University in 2014, and M.S. in Computer Science at University of California San Diego in 2017. He is currently pursuing a Ph.D. degree in computer engineering at Cornell University, advised by Prof. Edward Suh. His research interests include computer architecture and computer security, with an emphasize on the applications in cyber-physical systems and autonomous driving.
